steps.step: Melt the caramels and half the can of condensed milk in a pan on the stove top.
Mix the butter (melted), the cake mix and the rest of the condensed milk.
Spread half the cake mix on the bottom of a greased 9x13 pan.
Bring out of the oven and put the chocolate chips over the mix, then pour the melted caramels on top of this and finish up by crumbling the rest of the cake mixture on the top.
Let cool completely before cutting or the caramel will ooze out.
